import java.util.Scanner;

import java.util.Arrays;

class code1 {

 

	/**

	 * @param args

	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		short t;
		int n,i,j;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		t=sc.nextShort();
		while(t-->0)
		{
			n=sc.nextInt();
			int arr[]=new int[n];
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
				arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
			Arrays.sort(arr);
			i=0;
			j=n-1;
			while(i<=j){
				if(i<j){
				System.out.print(arr[j]+" ");
				j--;
				}
				if(i<=j){
					System.out.print(arr[i]+" ");
					i++;
				}	
			}
			System.out.println();	
		}
	}
}
